name: FormsForWeb Packet
summary: An FFWP file is a fillable form created by Lucom FormsForWeb, a form creation tool. Typically, FFWP files are embedded as part of web applications, in which users can fill out the form the file contains. However, users can also fill out FFWP forms offline with Lucom FormsForWeb Filler, a free Windows application.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
